name: David Ramirez
text: This government's representatives  frequently resort to outright lies.     Many of its loudest supporters have amplified fake news.     But to the willingly blind, they can be made to see whatever they want.     http://newsinfo.inquirer.net/875175/doj-chief-falls-victim-to-fake-ambush
